title: Add admin controls + safe mode for auto-routing/auto-creation (manual review / dry-run)

sections.text: Introduce workspace-level settings to control automation behavior, including an opt-in “manual review” mode and a “dry-run” preview that shows what Jira/Linear actions would be taken without executing them. Require explicit enablement per integration and restrict who can toggle automation (admin-only) to reduce accidental mis-assignment. Surface a clear UI warning when auto-routing/creation is enabled and provide a one-click kill switch to pause automation.
